Text: Hello HighCode. Not sure about stand alone playback, but I can say that I looked at a several scenes with a lot of movement on a 92" display. Looks great to me! Thanks again.

92"? WOW! Mine is only 42" plasma.
Thanks for comment phase700b

Argo 720p  http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8102527/Argo_2012_BDRip_720p_DTS_multisub_HighCode
is perfect, a 1080p encode won't look any better unless with projector on a huge screen. I won't upload it again in 1080p, for me this 720p is perfect.

Another reason not to bother with 1080p of Argo is it's 1970's look and film grain. It sort of looks old. Certainly no eye popping visuals. I had a huge 1080p copy of Argo and immediately saw it was unnecessary. I got rid of it in favor of a 720p copy. 720p really is plenty good enough for Argo. Just my opinion.
